      • executeApiCall

        protected <TResponse> TResponse executeApiCall​(AuthleteApiBasicImpl.AuthleteApiCall<TResponse> apiCall)
                                        throws AuthleteApiException
        Execute an Authlete API call. Note: All context handling (creation, exception wrapping, cleanup) is now centralized in the callApi method, eliminating the need for ThreadLocal context.
        Throws:
        AuthleteApiException
